edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva

Class Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva.Element
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity, Tile

    public abstract class Element
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents an object that has a defined location and size

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Rectangle bounds 
      protected int height 
      protected Vector2 position 
      protected int width 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Element(Vector2 position, int width, int height)
      Constructor which sets the value of an element position, width, and height based on the passed values, as well as creating the bounds object given the other three values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Element

        public Element(Vector2 position,
               int width,
               int height)
        Constructor which sets the value of an element position, width, and height based on the passed values, as well as creating the bounds object given the other three values
        Parameters:
        width - this represents how wide the Element object's bounds will be
        height - this represent how tall the Element object's bounds will be
        position - a Vector2 object that represents the location (top left corner) of the Element object

    • Method Detail

      • drawIt

        public abstract void drawIt(java.awt.Graphics2D win)
        abstract class that draws the elements in the window
        Parameters:
        win - Graphics2D object that represents the window object for drawing to a GUI

        Parameters:

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
